alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 07 at 5:02AM PST until January 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 29 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Clara Valley and Eastern Santa Clara Hills. * WHEN...For the first Frost Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the second Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coldest temperatures will be across interior and southern portions of Santa Clara county and not San Jose city proper.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
